channel.title: Ice Barrage Problems
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm the editor on a server and there's a problem with magics..So lets say you ice barrage some one in the wild. They can get out of the freeze if they follow you or if they have a melee weapon they follow you with the attack option. How can this be fixed? Oh and by the way the source is Delta Scape. Please help me out, the Owner will appreciate it. Thank you.

item.title: Ice Barrage Problems
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

xx Santa pker xX:

Hey guys, I’m the editor on Armo Scape and there’s a problem with magics…So lets say you ice barrage some one in the wild. They can get out of the freeze if they follow you or if they have a melee weapon they follow you with the attack option. How can this be fixed? Oh and by the way the source is Delta Scape. Please help me out, Armo will appreciate it. Thank you.

Coder B G S?
